title: Strawberry cheesecake
description: Paul Rankin layers citrusy crushed biscuits, stewed strawberries and cheesecake in this easy yet dramatic dessert.
ingredients: ½ tbsp freshly grated lemon zest, very finely chopped
6 tbsp orange juice or juice from the strawberries
2 tsp cornflour, dissolved in a little cold water or orange juice
